title: Under His... Shorts
description: Under His... Shorts is a collection of short stories set in the Under His Heel universe, both pre-Under His Heel and post Under His Skin. See how Alex got his scar, and why Tracht decided on Alex as his new bondservant; the first time Alex met Tracht's mother, and even their first vacation after Alex's contract ends.There are 60,000 words worth of new content for Alex and Tracht, varying in both light and dark tones.These are not standalone--please check out the main series first before diving into this short story collection.
author: Adara Wolf
